content: skill level | intermediate finished size | 4″ diameter includes tutorial if you re looking for a textured and versatile crochet flower to add a unique touch to your recently finished crochet or knitting project look no further than the popcorn flower it ll bring the right amount of three dimension for a subtle pop of texture add a button in the center for even more personality this quick little embellishment will give you lots of practice working the popcorn an excellent stitch for bringing texture to your projects you decide how big you want your flower to be with a single round of petals two or three- it s up to you pdf also available for purchase
